title: FS: Lajoie Throwing EPDG SGC 10 - SOLD
author: Thromdog

posts.post_title: FS: Lajoie Throwing EPDG SGC 10 - SOLD
posts.post_content:
Recently upgraded this guy so making him available.....not an easy get, especially in low grade.  Lajoie throwing with an EPDG back graded SGC 10. While condition of card isn’t great, I like that it has a full ad back and the front image is still strong.

Asking $SOLD shipped with a no fee method of payment if possible (PayPal friends, Venmo, CashApp), or check/MO with shipping on receipt.

Thanks for looking!
